channel.title: Free Cinema 4D! - Added R10
channel.description:
[center][b]About Cinema 4D R10[/b][/center]
The 10th generation, representing two decades of excellence. The tenth generation of CINEMA 4D is a milestone in the development of professional 3D software and a testament to two decades of excellence by MAXON's programming team. Professional 3D animation tools have never been more approachable. [i]The most accessible 3D application[/i] CINEMA 4D's intuitive interface and logical workflow make it possible for those new to 3D artistry to dive in and be productive quickly. Feedback is smooth and interactive so you can let your creativity run free. Included in the CINEMA 4D R10 documentation is the new 200+ page Quickstart manual, several hours of video tutorials and a context-sensitive help documentation, which covers not only the entire CINEMA 4D core application but all available modules as well. This fast and easy to use help system's browser is fully integrated into CINEMA 4D and offers immediate answers to your questions regarding any part of CINEMA 4D. [i]State-of-the-art technology[/i] CINEMA 4D's state-of-the-art architecture means it's always the first to benefit from new technologies and advancements. Most recently, MAXON was the first to release 64 bit Windows and Intel-based Macintosh versions. You'll never have to wait to take advantage of the latest hardware. [i]Modularity makes it suitable for all industries.[/i] The basic application contains everything you need to create high-end 3D images and animations. For those artists whose work demands more than the basic application, MAXON provides numerous seamlessly integrated modules. Modules can also be purchased individually or in affordable bundles. There's a CINEMA 4D to satisfy the needs of every artist and industry where 3D graphics are utilized. Take a tour through our solutions pages to see the myriad of industries where CINEMA 4D dominates and thrives. Then download a demo version and see for yourself. CINEMA 4D is available in several languages including English, German, French, Spanish, and more
[b] System Requirements[/b] Minimum hardware requirements Mac OS X 10.3 or Windows 2000 / XP 512 MByte RAM, CPU 1GHz Suggested hardware requirements Mac OS X 10.3 or Windows 2000 / XP 1024 MByte RAM, CPU 2 GHz QuickTime current OpenGL-capable graphics card CD-ROM-drive, hard drive. Depending on license, Macintosh or Windows only. Registration with MAXON Computer is required for long-term use of software. Useful tutorial websites [code] http://www.C4DCafe.com http://www.Google.com http://www.tutorialized.com/tutorials/Cinema-4D/1 http://www.deviantART.com http://www.pixel2life.com/tutorials/Cinema_4D/All/ http://www.Demonoid.com - (Torrent) [/code] [b]Terms[/b] C4D - Cinema 4D R10 - Release 10. R9.6 - Guess.. [b] If you have something to add just post it.[/b]

[/quote][/quote]

And 6 downloads But only 3 posts… (leader doesn’t count and neither do I … exps posted 2 times )[/quote]
nvm i got keygan. got it myself

item.title: Free Cinema 4D! - Added R10
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[center]About Cinema 4D R10[/center]

The 10th generation, representing two decades of excellence.

The tenth generation of CINEMA 4D is a milestone in the development of professional 3D software and a testament to two decades of excellence by MAXON’s programming team. Professional 3D animation tools have never been more approachable.

The most accessible 3D application

CINEMA 4D’s intuitive interface and logical workflow make it possible for those new to 3D artistry to dive in and be productive quickly. Feedback is smooth and interactive so you can let your creativity run free.

Included in the CINEMA 4D R10 documentation is the new 200+ page Quickstart manual, several hours of video tutorials and a context-sensitive help documentation, which covers not only the entire CINEMA 4D core application but all available modules as well. This fast and easy to use help system’s browser is fully integrated into CINEMA 4D and offers immediate answers to your questions regarding any part of CINEMA 4D.

State-of-the-art technology

CINEMA 4D’s state-of-the-art architecture means it’s always the first to benefit from new technologies and advancements. Most recently, MAXON was the first to release 64 bit Windows and Intel-based Macintosh versions. You’ll never have to wait to take advantage of the latest hardware.

Modularity makes it suitable for all industries.

The basic application contains everything you need to create high-end 3D images and animations. For those artists whose work demands more than the basic application, MAXON provides numerous seamlessly integrated modules. Modules can also be purchased individually or in affordable bundles.

There’s a CINEMA 4D to satisfy the needs of every artist and industry where 3D graphics are utilized. Take a tour through our solutions pages to see the myriad of industries where CINEMA 4D dominates and thrives. Then download a demo version and see for yourself.

CINEMA 4D is available in several languages including English, German, French, Spanish, and more

System Requirements

Minimum hardware requirements
Mac OS X 10.3 or Windows 2000 / XP
512 MByte RAM, CPU 1GHz

Suggested hardware requirements
Mac OS X 10.3 or Windows 2000 / XP
1024 MByte RAM, CPU 2 GHz
QuickTime
current OpenGL-capable graphics card

CD-ROM-drive, hard drive.
Depending on license, Macintosh or Windows only.
Registration with MAXON Computer is required for
long-term use of software.

Useful tutorial websites

http://www.C4DCafe.com
http://www.Google.com
http://www.tutorialized.com/tutorials/Cinema-4D/1
http://www.deviantART.com

R10 - Release 10.
